title: ClimateWise
subtitle: Weather App – Conditional Fetch, Custom Hook, Shared State
description: A React weather application featuring a reusable custom fetch hook, conditional API requests, and dynamic UI updates based on real-time weather data. Includes history-based re-fetching and adaptive backgrounds, demonstrating advanced state management and asynchronous data handling.

title: CineMate
subtitle: Movie Database App – Favorites Management, State Handling, Dynamic UI
description: A React movie database application allowing users to browse movies, mark favorites, and manage a personalized watchlist. Built to strengthen skills in state management, conditional rendering, and modular component architecture.

title: New York Times Best Sellers
subtitle: Books App – Controlled Inputs, List Rendering, State Management
description: An interactive React application that allows users to add, track, and manage a personal collection of books. Built to practice controlled components, dynamic list rendering, and efficient state-driven UI updates.

title: Motivation Quotes
subtitle: React App - CSS - JavaScript (ES6)
description: A minimalist React app that displays random motivational quotes to inspire users throughout the day. Built with functional components and React hooks, it features a clean design, smooth transitions, just perfect for a quick boost of positivity.

title: Reviews
subtitle: React Practice App – State, Props, Component Structure
description: A React app that cycles through user reviews using forward/back navigation. Built to practice passing data via props, managing state for active items, and structuring UI into clean functional components.

title: Birthday Buddy
subtitle: React Practice App – Manage and Clear Contact List
description: A simple yet effective React app for practicing state management. It displays upcoming birthdays, allows clearing the full list, and demonstrates the use of props, dynamic rendering, and conditional UI.

title: BMI Calculator
subtitle: React Practice App – BMI Calculator, Form Handling, State Management
description: A simple React app that calculates Body Mass Index based on user input. Built to practice form handling, controlled components, and state-driven UI updates in a clean functional component structure.

title: Calculator
subtitle: React Practice App – Calculator, State Logic, Event Handling
description: A fully functional calculator built with React, supporting basic arithmetic operations. Focuses on managing complex state logic, handling user input, and structuring interactive UI components.

title: Todo List
subtitle: Todo App - State Management, CRUD Operations
description: A classic todo list app that allows users to add, complete, and remove tasks. Developed to practice state management, dynamic rendering, and building reusable functional components.
